mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO helpinfo (info_id, uid, title, uname, content, date, longitude, latitude, tag) VALUES (#{infoId},#{uid}, #{title}, #{uname}, #{content}, #{date}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{tag})
mapper.select: SELECT uid, info_id, uname, title, content, date, longitude, latitude, tag FROM helpinfo
SELECT uid, info_id, uname, title, content, date, longitude, latitude, tag FROM helpinfo WHERE tag = #{tag}
